question: You have recently started working for a new company. Write a letter to an English-speaking friend. In your letter: - Explain the reasons why you changed jobs. - Describe your new job. - Tell him/her your other news.
text: How are you? I hope you and your family are doing well. It’s been only a few months since we met last, but it looks really long. However, I am writing this letter to inform you that I have secured a job in a well-established travel company.

You must remember, I was looking for a change for quite some time. However, my previous company was good. They are paying me well; The co-workers were good too but after a point, I started feeling I am not able to utilize my potential. Hence, I started giving an interview and luckily I grabbed this opportunity as an Internation travel manager. This job is giving me an opportunity to meet new people from all over the world. Also, my job package includes travelling to a country for 10 days and I will be shooting my travel blogs for my company I found this quite interesting. What do you think?
Let me know your thoughts about my new job. Give my regards to your family members and especially your younger sister.
